game.title: Observable Sorrow
game.dedication: Observable Sorrow is a clone of <link>Kittens Game</link>.
game.blurb: You are a kitten in a catnip forest.

woodcutter.label: Woodcutter
woodcutter.description: Chop some forest trees for wood.

farmer.label: Farmer
farmer.description: Cultivate catnip in the surrounding lands.

scholar.label: Scholar
scholar.description: Ponder the myriad wonders of the world around you.

miner.label: Miner
miner.description: Dig into the depths of Cath for minerals.
miner.flavor: How do I hold a pick with my paws…?

happiness.label: Happiness {{amount}}
happiness.detail: Happiness affects your workers' production and consumption of catnip. Rare resources will increase this value whilst overpopulation will reduce it.

gather_catnip.label: Gather catnip
gather_catnip.description: Gather some catnip in the forest.

refine_catnip.label: Refine catnip
refine_catnip.description: Use your mystical kitten powers to convert catnip into wood.

catnip_field.label: Catnip field
catnip_field.description: Plant some catnip to grow in the village. Fields have increased production during Spring and decreased production during Winter.
catnip_field.flavor: ‘Nip as far as the eye can see.

hut.label: Hut
hut.description: A simple home with space for 2 kittens. Kittens consume catnip to stay alive.

library.label: Library
library.description: A library to store sacred catkind knowledge. Each level increases science output.

barn.label: Barn
barn.description: A space to store more of your resources.
barn.flavor: Rats ain't a problem for us!

mine.label: Mine
mine.description: Allows the acquisition of minerals. Each level increases mineral output.

kitten.arrived_one: A kitten has joined your village!

calendar.label: Calendar
calendar.description: Develops the ability to predict when the seasons will change. Essential for advanced agriculture.
calendar.effect: Provides a way of more precise time tracking.

agriculture.label: Agriculture
agriculture.description: The basis of all civilised life. Allows the working of land for food.

archery.label: Archery
archery.description: Develops the ranged weaponry known as a 'bow'.

mining.label: Mining
mining.description: Develops the ability to extract mineral resources from the bowels fo Cath.
mining.flavor: Pickaxes are easier to hold with opposable thumbs.

astronomy.rare_event: A rare astronomical event occurred in the sky.

observed_sky_reward.capped: Observed rare event! No science, but it was really neat!

fallen_meteor_reward.gained_minerals: A meteor fell near the village! Gained {{minerals_amount}} minerals!
fallen_meteor_reward.capped: A meteor fell near the village! Fascinating.
